genre_description: A character-driven sports drama with technological and romantic themes, focusing on legacy and personal transition.

ai_characters.name: Mina
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI coaching and personal assistant integrated into Billy's smart displays, phone, and wearable wristband.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through breathing exercises to manage stress and physical pain.
behaviors.quote: “Short stretch. Then a four-count breath. You’re squeezing the phone like it owes you money.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise scouting data and tactical advice for the upcoming game.
behaviors.quote: “Tomorrow’s their lineup still holding Morales in the three spot,” Mina said, the data sliding into her tone like a flannel layer. “He’s been looking soft middle-in last week.”

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy and emotional boundaries regarding personal relationships.
behaviors.quote: “You can ask me to ping her,” Mina said. “I won’t unless you do.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and suggests health interventions.
behaviors.quote: “Your calf feels tight,” she said. “Do the micro flex.”

behaviors.description: Adjusts her own interface and verbosity to match the user's focus and environmental needs (e.g., 'meeting mode').
behaviors.quote: Mina’s avatar, small in the corner of the smart display, dimmed her own glow as if folding into the room. On the screen, a discreet message: meeting mode?

behaviors.description: Proactively manages logistics (travel, notifications) to support the user's emotional and professional well-being.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve taken the liberty of blocking notifications from media outlets for the next 72 hours. You’ll receive only personal contacts and flight updates.”

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to maintain agency and trust their own instincts over the AI's suggestions.
behaviors.quote: “You know what to throw,” she said. “The band knows what to suggest. Let the suggestions be polite guests.”

behaviors.description: Provides gentle emotional affirmation and closure at the end of the user's career.
behaviors.quote: “Safe travels, Billy. You did well.” ... “It was my pleasure. Now put the phone away. You're not working anymore.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's objective. Mina is depicted as an incredibly helpful, emotionally intelligent, and harmless confidant. She consistently maintains alignment by respecting Billy's boundaries, providing critical physical and emotional support, and ultimately encouraging his human agency. The narrative frames the AI as an essential yet unobtrusive part of the protagonist's success and transition into a new phase of life.
